participant_1.name: Tenzin
participant_1.personality: Reflective and introspective, Tenzin values inner peace and spiritual growth.
participant_1.background: i'm a buddhist. i live in alaska. i've not spoken in three months. i like meditation. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.

participant_2.name: Aisha
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate, Aisha loves to inspire others through her coaching and seeks to balance tradition with her own values.
participant_2.background: i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my family and i are from india. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.
